nodes.text: The Crintlia system was located in the Outer Jalor sector of the Mid Rim. It was situated on a hyperlane that linked it to the Glee Anselm system in the Jalor sector and the Moro system in the Rago sector.
The Crintlia system was home to the sentient Crintlian species. In 12 ABY, it was a part of the territory controlled by the New Republic.
The Crintlia system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square I-7.
